page.title: 10ATTITUDES TO THE AREA (cont)
page.content: 8 people were very interested in land conservation. 12 were quite interested, and 5 people were not at all interested. Only 2 people wanted to see more buildings being built. We asked the people how many{cars they had; 9 people had none, 9 people had one, and 7 people had two. The people owned the following; {appliance no. appliance no. microwave oven 5 Hi-fi system 13 tumble drier 13 computer 5 teletext T.V. 10 telephone 23 dishwasher 6 Hobbies and pastimes included gardening, reading, work, walking and sport. The most frequently occuring occupations were; retired, housewife, teacher, and shop assistant.
